question: What are the key risks and strategies in volatility trading?

expert_sources.title: Volatility and the Alchemy of Risk
The Variance Risk Premium
expert_sources.relevance: Theoretical foundation for volatility risk premium

key_findings.finding: Implied volatility systematically exceeds realized volatility (variance risk premium)
Short volatility strategies earn premium but have severe tail risk
VIX futures are typically in contango, creating roll cost for long vol positions
The XIV collapse in Feb 2018 showed catastrophic short vol risks
Volatility mean-reverts but regime changes can persist
Long volatility positions provide crisis alpha but bleed in calm markets

known_counterarguments.argument: Volatility risk premium compensates for legitimate risk
known_counterarguments.validity: True, but sizing is critical to avoid ruin

known_counterarguments.argument: VIX products don't perfectly track volatility
known_counterarguments.validity: Valid, VIX futures have basis risk to spot VIX

known_counterarguments.argument: Dynamic hedging can manage short vol risk
known_counterarguments.validity: Partially true but gap risk remains

areas_of_uncertainty: Optimal sizing for short vol strategies
